title: section 69 of the Courts of Justice Act 1936, by virtue of the powers conferred on
heading: 1. (1) These Rules, which may be cited as the Circuit Court Rules (Data
text_raw:
1. (1) These Rules, which may be cited as the Circuit Court Rules (Data 
Protection Actions) 2020, shall come into operation on the 13th day of August

title: section 69 of the Courts of Justice Act 1936, by virtue of the powers conferred on
heading: (2) These Rules shall be construed together with the Circuit Court Rules
text_raw:
2020. 

(2) These Rules shall be construed together with the Circuit Court Rules 

2001 to 2020. 

(3) The Circuit Court Rules 2001 to 2020 as amended by these Rules may 

be cited as the Circuit Court Rules 2001 to 2020.
text_norm: 2020 (2) rule shall construed together circuit court rule 2001 2020 (3) circuit court rule 2001 2020 amended rule may cited circuit court rule 2001 2020

title: section 69 of the Courts of Justice Act 1936, by virtue of the powers conferred on
heading: 2. The Circuit Court Rules (Data Protection Actions) 2019 (S.I. No. 222 of
text_raw:
2. The Circuit Court Rules (Data Protection Actions) 2019 (S.I. No. 222 of 
2019) are amended by the substitution for paragraph (1) of regulation 2 therein of 
the following paragraph: 

“(1) Proceedings under the Data Protection Act 1988 commenced 
before the Circuit Court but not completed on the date on which section 
8 of the Data Protection Act 2018 came into operation may, subject to 
the provisions of the Data Protection Act 2018, be continued and 
determined as if these Rules had not come into operation.” 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th August, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [291]

title: section 69 of the Courts of Justice Act 1936, by virtue of the powers conferred on
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This rule substitutes regulation 2(1) of S.I. No. 222 of 2019 (Circuit Court 
Rules (Data Protection Actions) 2019) to rectify the reference therein to “the 
Data Protection Act 1988”.
